legal_basis: Ontario Human Rights Code, Section 2(1) - Receipt of Public Assistance
suggestion: Cannot refuse tenants receiving public assistance (Ontario Works, ODSP, etc.).

legal_basis: Ontario Human Rights Code, Section 2(1) - Family Status
suggestion: Cannot discriminate based on family status including presence of children.

legal_basis: BC Human Rights Code, Section 8 - Lawful Source of Income
suggestion: Must accept all lawful sources of income including social assistance.

legal_basis: Quebec Charter of Human Rights and Freedoms, Section 10 - Civil Status
suggestion: Cannot discriminate based on civil status (married, single, divorced, etc.).

legal_basis: Canadian Human Rights Act, Section 3(1) - Race, National or Ethnic Origin
suggestion: Cannot discriminate against Indigenous peoples or based on ethnic origin.
